Rhapsody.entities

Class Passenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Rhapsody.entities.Passenger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Passenger
extends java.lang.Thread
    Passenger Thread Implements the life-cycle of the passenger and stores it's current state.

    Passenger life-cycle as 2 possible ways

    • Arrival with all bags
      1. Passengers arrives to the disembarking zone
      2. Passenger goes to luggage collection point (conveyor or storeroom)
      3. Passenger tries to collect a bag
      4. Repeat step 3 until passenger successfully collects all bags
      5. Passenger successfully collects all bags and goes Home or departs
    • Arrival with lost bags
      1. Passengers arrives to the disembarking zone
      2. Passenger goes to luggage collection point (conveyor or storeroom)
      3. Passenger tries to collect a bag
      4. Repeat step 3 until passenger notices bag is lost
      5. Passenger goes to baggage reclaim office
      6. Passenger goes Home or departs
    • Departure
      1. Passengers arrives to the Airport
      2. Passenger try to take a bus
      3. Passenger enters the bus
      4. Passenger exits the bus
      5. Passenger enter departure terminal
      6. Passenger prepares next leg

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      java.lang.String[] getPassengerSituation()

      void run()
      Passenger life-cycle Passenger arrives and informs of it's arival to the lounge [Lounge.java] {AT_DISEMBARKING_ZONE} The Lounge puts the passenger on hold until it can go to the baggage collection point (porter might be busy with another plane) The Lounge checks if this passenger is the last of it's flight, if it is awakes the porter, if it's not allows the porter to sleep more When the porter awakes goes to the baggage collection point [BaggageCollectionPoint.java] {AT_LUGGAGE_COLLECTION} In collection point tries to collect all bags If successfull will go back to lounge or goHome (50/50 chance) {AT_DISEMBARKING_ZONE, EXIT_ARRIVAL_TERMINAL} If porter signals end of bags before it has collected all bags it will go to baggage reclaim office {AT_LUGGAGE_RECLAIM} Baggage Reclaim office will answer all at the same time(?) [BaggageReclaim.java] After claiming all luggage it will try to enter the bus waiting line [ArrivalTerminalTransfer] {ARRIVING_TRANSFER_TERMINAL} Waits for the bus to arrive Try to get in the bus or wait if bus is full {TERMINAL_TRANSFER} Arrives at departure terminal transfer quay [DepartureTerminalTransfer.java] {DEPARTING_TRANSFER_TERMINAL} Enters the departure terminal to prepare next leg of journey [DepartureTerminalEntrance.java] {DEPARTING} Notes: [] -> shared memory region which will control {} -> state it will enter () -> doubts/extra info a-zA-Z0-9 -> specification
      void setCurrentBags(int currentBags)
      Sets passenger current bags
      void setCurrentState(PassengerState state)
      Passenger state alteration function
